bug title: Sorting by price from the lowest on the 'BEST SELLERS' tab is not performed
description: Sorting by price from the lowest on the 'BEST SELLERS' tab is not performed
steps to reproduce: 2. Click on the magnifying glass next to the search bar
3. Scroll through the page and click the 'all best sellers' button located under TOP SELLERS
expected results: Products are sorted from cheap to expensive
actual results: Products are sorted from expensive to cheap
